text:
Gilbert and Marshall,
Amy will be with you two.

- You're the new girl, right?
- I'm Amy.

Welcome to the secrets
of the Egyptian tomb.

Shouldn't there be
another mummy?

Woman: The mummy
mysteriously disappeared.

- I found the stolen mummy!
- ( roars )
Hey, there. Nice mummy.

You want me to take a mummy
into my house with my mom home?

You're the one
who loves mummies.

- Who's your friend?
- That's Harold.
Kid from school.

He's actually pretty cool
once you get used to him.

- Here, it's hot sauce.
- ( burps )

- The mummy.
- It's gone.

You've got to stick
with us, Harold.

It's not safe to run off.
We need some expert advice.

If he doesn't make it
back into his coffin,
he could turn to dust.
We have to help Harold.

Friends have each
others' backs, right?

- Grab him, now!
- Harold, watch out!
I don't know if I can do this.

Face your fears, remember?
We're in this together.

Watch "Under Wraps"
on Disney Channel.
